Name: U
Description/Notes: Horizontal velocity as a complex quantity (u + 1j * v)

Name: U_dir
Description/Notes: "Direction of the horizontal velocity (CCW from X

Name: I
Description/Notes: Turbulence Intensity: ratio of horizontal velocity standard deviation (`U_std`) to mean ('U_mag')

Name: I_tke
Description/Notes: TKE Intensity: Ratio of sqrt(2*tke) to horizontal velocity magnitude

Name: tke
Description/Notes: Turbulent kinetic energy (half the sum of the data in `'tke_vec'`)
